Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along a busy section of Lankshire Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: Lankshire Parkway runs between two shopping centers on both sides of the road. On the east side of the road, you can see a large complex, whose entrance is located off of Hillborough Way. On the west, you can see Leo's Waxworks shop, where all sorts of wax figures, candles or other useful wax items are made and sold.
